part.narration: First day of the week, right before work. Yuki is outside of the headquarters building. She gets a cellphone call.
part.line: Hello?
It's getting crazy up in the club, huh?
Oh. It's alright.
No, I won't kill you. Not today.
part.narration: Yuki hangs up the phone and frowns.Yuki looks up at the Concierge menu. The Concierge menu disappears. The Player didn't even get to see what it did.
Yuki enters the studio. Takuya makes a mad dash to her highness.
part.line: Mademoiselle!
In the morn I opened the gates and some Madame walked in as if Sega was hers!
I told the ginger Pomme, "leave our offices!"
And she then smiled, and in her tongue insulted me,
Telling me words like "sélective" and "intrépide" and "séduisant—"
I felt violated.
I think she's looking for a job.
part.narration: Yuki keeps walking. She reaches her station and stops. An older woman, on the opposite side of Yuki's desk, rather politely sits. The woman turns around.
part.line: Greetings.
I observed your actions on June 6 2011 at 5:04 PM.
You stated that your company is an equal opportunity employer. Confirm?
part.narration: She's right. Yuki sighs.A single dialogue box pops up. The only option available is "Yes." The Player must click the option of his own accord.
part.line: Yeah.
I also stated that application's not till the 30th.
The date you have stated, June 30 2011, is 17 days from the current date.
You are procrastinating.
part.narration: Yuki folds her arms.The interview interface appears.
part.line: Fine, you want a job?
part.narration: Yuki rushes to her chair. She asks the woman the typical interview questions, and stops to chat in between.Following are the lines between the interview questions. Dialogue continues after the interview.
part.line: What can you do?
I posess no experience within the video game industry or with video games themselves.
The last video game I played was a PC-8801 game about a red-headed football player.
You're supposed to tell me what you can do.
I am a cinematographer.
Disadvantageous to your situation.
A friend of the film industry is an enemy of mine.
I—
I have connections to every electronics retailer and warehouse in the Ota Ward.
For your expansion come June 30 2011, you will require machinery.
Yeah, cool! You drive a hard bargain!
Welcome aboard~
part.narration: Yuki dances away. The woman watches as Yuki leaves to attend to more important matters.
part.line: You didn't ask me my name.
part.comment: She looks at the camera. Zoom in.
part.line: Do you care about who I am?
I'm Lori Ciel—
part.comment: The camera sweeps over to Yuki.
part.line: Nine o'clock! Nine o'clock!
